0.text: Innate: Talon's abilities apply a stack of Wound to enemy  champions and large  monsters each time they are hit. Wound lasts for 6 seconds, refreshing with basic attacks and subsequent hits, and stacks up to 3 times.
0.html: Innate: Talon's abilities apply a stack of Wound to enemy champions and large monsters each time they are hit. Wound lasts for 6 seconds, refreshing with basic attacks and subsequent hits, and stacks up to 3 times.
markedPassages: champions
monsters

1.text: Talon's next  basic attack against an enemy with 3 Wound stacks is empowered to consume them all to cause the target to bleed, dealing「 75 − 245 (based on level) (+ 200% bonus AD) total physical damage over 2 seconds, 」「 4.6875 − 15.3125 (based on level) (+ 12.5% bonus AD) physical damage every 0.125 seconds over 2 seconds, 」increased to 120% damage against  monsters. The target cannot gain stacks during this time.
1.html: Talon's next basic attack against an enemy with 3 Wound stacks is empowered to consume them all to cause the target to bleed, dealing「 75 − 245 (based on level) (+ 200% bonus AD) total physical damage over 2 seconds, 」「 4.6875 − 15.3125 (based on level) (+ 12.5% bonus AD) physical damage every 0.125 seconds over 2 seconds, 」increased to 120% damage against monsters. The target cannot gain stacks during this time.
markedPassages: basic attack

「 75 − 245 (based on level) (+ 200% bonus AD) total physical damage over 2 seconds, 」

monsters

0.text: Active: Talon  dashes towards the target enemy, dealing physical damage upon arrival. If Noxian Diplomacy is cast within close range, Talon instead stabs the target to  critically strike for (50% +  35%) bonus physical damage, as well as gain  75 bonus attack range on his next basic attack within 1 second.
0.html: Active: Talon dashes towards the target enemy, dealing physical damage upon arrival. If Noxian Diplomacy is cast within close range, Talon instead stabs the target to critically strike for (50% +  35%) bonus physical damage, as well as gain  75 bonus attack range on his next basic attack within 1 second.
markedPassages: dashes
critically strike
(50% +  35%) bonus physical damage
35%
75 bonus attack range

1.text: If Noxian Diplomacy kills the target, Talon  heals for 9 − 55 (based on level) and its cooldown is  reduced by 50%.
1.html: If Noxian Diplomacy kills the target, Talon heals for 9 − 55 (based on level) and its cooldown is  reduced by 50%.
markedPassages: heals
reduced

2.text: Noxian Diplomacy's stab  resets Talon's basic attack timer.  Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.
2.html: Noxian Diplomacy's stab resets Talon's basic attack timer. Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.
markedPassages: resets
Shadow Assault

0.text: Active: Talon throws a fan of daggers in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Talon throws a fan of daggers in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit.

1.text: At maximum range, the daggers linger for 0.75 seconds before homing back to Talon, dealing physical damage and  slowing enemies hit for 1 second. Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
1.html: At maximum range, the daggers linger for 0.75 seconds before homing back to Talon, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies hit for 1 second. Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
markedPassages: slowing

2.html: Rake deals 105% damage against monsters.
markedPassages: monsters

0.text: Active: Talon  dashes up to 800 units over the target area of terrain, during which he gains  unobstructed vision.
0.html: Active: Talon dashes up to 800 units over the target area of terrain, during which he gains unobstructed vision.
markedPassages: dashes
unobstructed vision

1.text: Talon cannot cast Assassin's Path on the same area of terrain for a set duration.
1.html: Talon cannot cast Assassin's Path on the same area of terrain for a set duration.

2.text: Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.
2.html: Shadow Assault can be cast during the dash.
markedPassages: Shadow Assault

0.text: Active: Talon disperses a ring of blades around him that deals physical damage to nearby enemies, and gains  invisibility and  bonus movement speed for up to 2.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Talon disperses a ring of blades around him that deals physical damage to nearby enemies, and gains invisibility and  bonus movement speed for up to 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: invisibility
bonus movement speed

1.text: Shadow Assault can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or if Talon emerges from invisibility.
1.html: Shadow Assault can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or if Talon emerges from invisibility.

2.text: Recast: Talon ends Shadow Assault, breaking invisibility and converging the blades to him, dealing the same physical damage to enemies hit. Breaking invisibility with a basic attack or  Noxian Diplomacy causes the blades to converge to the target instead.
2.html: Recast: Talon ends Shadow Assault, breaking invisibility and converging the blades to him, dealing the same physical damage to enemies hit. Breaking invisibility with a basic attack or Noxian Diplomacy causes the blades to converge to the target instead.
markedPassages: Noxian Diplomacy

abilities.concerningText: Active: Talon  dashes towards the target enemy, dealing physical damage upon arrival. If Noxian Diplomacy is cast within close range, Talon instead stabs the target to  critically strike for (50% +  35%) bonus physical damage, as well as gain  75 bonus attack range on his next basic attack within 1 second.
Active: Talon throws a fan of daggers in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit.
At maximum range, the daggers linger for 0.75 seconds before homing back to Talon, dealing physical damage and  slowing enemies hit for 1 second. Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
At maximum range, the daggers linger for 0.75 seconds before homing back to Talon, dealing physical damage and  slowing enemies hit for 1 second. Enemies can be hit only once per pass.

Active: Talon disperses a ring of blades around him that deals physical damage to nearby enemies, and gains  invisibility and  bonus movement speed for up to 2.5 seconds.
